text: Hanki ama ana nanekema eri tamagema senakura, ofri'ma mani'naza vahera huzmantesnuge'zama mago'a ru kumategama vanazana, Tasisima, Putima, Ludima, Mesekima, Tubalima, Javani kumate'ene hageri amu'nompima me'nea kumatamimpine huzmantesnuge'za vu'za Nagri'ma nageza antahi'za osu'naza vahetera nagri hankavegura ome huama hugahaze.
